title: Watch: Indian-Origin UK MP Shivani Raja Takes Oath On Bhagavad Gita
content: Indian-origin Shivani Raja has become the first Conservative MP to win the Leicester East seat in 37 years.
summary: Indian-origin Shivani Raja has become the first Conservative MP to win the Leicester East seat in 37 years.

title: Cooking Oil Transported In Fuel Containers? Huge Uproar In China
content: Revelations that cooking oil has been transported in containers also used to carry fuel have sparked outrage in China, the latest scandal in a country where fears about food safety are widespread.
summary: Revelations that cooking oil has been transported in containers also used to carry fuel have sparked outrage in China, the latest scandal in a country where fears about food safety are widespread.

title: Dark Side Of Manifesting And Believing Our Thoughts Have Too Much Power
content: Have you tried manifesting? Its hard to escape on social media  the idea that you can will what you desire into reality through the power of belief. This could be financial success, romantic love or sporting glory.
summary: Have you tried manifesting? Its hard to escape on social media  the idea that you can will what you desire into reality through the power of belief. This could be financial success, romantic love or sporting glory.

title: "Future Couldn't Be Brighter": Sunita Williams On US Sending Indian To Space
content: Indian-origin Sunita Williams has said she is looking forward to meeting the Indian astronauts who will fly to the International Space Station (ISS).
summary: Indian-origin Sunita Williams has said she is looking forward to meeting the Indian astronauts who will fly to the International Space Station (ISS).

title: Australian Father Charged With Triple Murder After House Fire Kills Three
content: An Australian father faced triple murder charges Thursday, accused of setting his home ablaze and locking the door with his seven children and their mother inside.
summary: An Australian father faced triple murder charges Thursday, accused of setting his home ablaze and locking the door with his seven children and their mother inside.

title: Joe Biden To Address 1st Press Conference Since His Shaky Debate Performance
content: US President Joe Biden will Thursday give his first press conference since his debate disaster against Donald Trump, in a pressure-cooker moment that could seal the fate of his reelection bid.
summary: US President Joe Biden will Thursday give his first press conference since his debate disaster against Donald Trump, in a pressure-cooker moment that could seal the fate of his reelection bid.

title: China, Belarus Hold Army Drills Near NATO Border Amid Rising Tensions
content: China is staging army drills with Belarus this week at NATO's eastern border, in a sign of escalating tensions between Beijing and the US-led defence alliance.
summary: China is staging army drills with Belarus this week at NATO's eastern border, in a sign of escalating tensions between Beijing and the US-led defence alliance.

title: Elon Musk's Neuralink Brain Chip Implant "More Or Less Stable" In 1st Patient
content: The tiny wires of Neuralink's brain chip implant used in the first participant in a trial run by Elon Musk's company have become "more or less very stable", a company executive said on Wednesday.
summary: The tiny wires of Neuralink's brain chip implant used in the first participant in a trial run by Elon Musk's company have become "more or less very stable", a company executive said on Wednesday.

title: Watch: Pilot Aborts Takeoff After Smoke Billows From Tyres
content: The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is investigating after the pilots mentioned experiencing "multiple blown tyres."
summary: The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is investigating after the pilots mentioned experiencing "multiple blown tyres."

title: "Things Moving In Good Direction": US On Gaza Ceasefire Talks
content: The United States was "cautiously optimistic" about Gaza ceasefire talks, White House national security spokesperson John Kirby told CNN on Wednesday, adding that gaps between the two sides could be narrowed.
summary: The United States was "cautiously optimistic" about Gaza ceasefire talks, White House national security spokesperson John Kirby told CNN on Wednesday, adding that gaps between the two sides could be narrowed.

title: What Sunita Williams, Stuck In Space For A Month, Said On Her Homecoming
content: A pair of US astronauts stuck waiting to leave the International Space Station said Wednesday they were confident that the problem-plagued Boeing Starliner they rode up on would soon bring them home, even as significant uncertainties remain.
summary: A pair of US astronauts stuck waiting to leave the International Space Station said Wednesday they were confident that the problem-plagued Boeing Starliner they rode up on would soon bring them home, even as significant uncertainties remain.

title: How Blind Gamer Used ChatGPT To Roam Around On Japan Streets On His Own
content: Japanese eSports gamer Mashiro is blind and often relies on a companion to get around Tokyo -- but he hopes that artificial intelligence, hailed as a promising tool for people with disabilities, can help him travel alone.
summary: Japanese eSports gamer Mashiro is blind and often relies on a companion to get around Tokyo -- but he hopes that artificial intelligence, hailed as a promising tool for people with disabilities, can help him travel alone.

title: World's Largest Stegosaurus Skeleton Put On Action, May Fetch $4-6 Million
content: The largest stegosaurus skeleton ever found is expected to fetch millions of dollars at auction in New York next week, likely fueling objections from palaeontologists.
summary: The largest stegosaurus skeleton ever found is expected to fetch millions of dollars at auction in New York next week, likely fueling objections from palaeontologists.

title: 2 French Rugby Players Arrested On Sexual Assault Charges
content: An Argentine woman accusing two French international rugby players of rape was savagely beaten by her assailants, her lawyer said Wednesday, during an encounter that the men claim was consensual.
summary: An Argentine woman accusing two French international rugby players of rape was savagely beaten by her assailants, her lawyer said Wednesday, during an encounter that the men claim was consensual.

title: Big Win For Amazon Tribes Over Carbon Credits In Colombia
content: Colombia's Constitutional Court on Wednesday annulled a controversial carbon credit deal in the Amazon rainforest, which six local tribes said had been signed without their consent.
summary: Colombia's Constitutional Court on Wednesday annulled a controversial carbon credit deal in the Amazon rainforest, which six local tribes said had been signed without their consent.

title: "Like Reconnecting With Childhood": Developer On "Star Wars Outlaw" Game
content: Anticipation is building ahead of the August 30 release of "Star Wars Outlaws", an open-world game set between the events of the "Empire Strikes Back" and "Return of the Jedi".
summary: Anticipation is building ahead of the August 30 release of "Star Wars Outlaws", an open-world game set between the events of the "Empire Strikes Back" and "Return of the Jedi".

title: UK Police Arrest Crossbow Attack Suspect After 3 Women Killed
content: UK police said Wednesday a 26-year-old man was in custody after the wife and two daughters of a radio racing commentator were killed with a crossbow in a suspected "targeted" attack.
summary: UK police said Wednesday a 26-year-old man was in custody after the wife and two daughters of a radio racing commentator were killed with a crossbow in a suspected "targeted" attack.

title: What NATO Pledged To Ukraine At The Washington Summit
content: NATO countries at their summit in Washington on Wednesday came up with what alliance chief Jens Stoltenberg called a "substantial package" of support for Ukraine.
summary: NATO countries at their summit in Washington on Wednesday came up with what alliance chief Jens Stoltenberg called a "substantial package" of support for Ukraine.

title: First US Senate Democrat Calls For Biden To Step Aside Over Health Issues
content: Peter Welch on Wednesday became the first Democratic senator to publicly call on US President Joe Biden to ditch his reelection bid as concerns rise over his age and fitness.
summary: Peter Welch on Wednesday became the first Democratic senator to publicly call on US President Joe Biden to ditch his reelection bid as concerns rise over his age and fitness.

title: NATO Begins Sending F-16 Jets To Ukraine, Vows $43 Billion Military Aid
content: NATO allies on Wednesday announced they had started transferring F-16 jets to Ukraine and stepped up promises to Kyiv on eventual membership in the alliance at a 75th anniversary summit clouded by political uncertainties in the United States.
summary: NATO allies on Wednesday announced they had started transferring F-16 jets to Ukraine and stepped up promises to Kyiv on eventual membership in the alliance at a 75th anniversary summit clouded by political uncertainties in the United States.
